code: import{createMuiTheme}from'@material-ui/core/styles';import smalt from'../styles/colors/smalt.json';import negative from'../styles/colors/negative.json';import gold from'../styles/colors/gold.json';import greyscale from'../styles/colors/greyscale.json';import green from'@material-ui/core/colors/green';var theme=createMuiTheme({palette:{primary:gold,secondary:green,negative:negative,smalt:smalt,greyscale:greyscale,background:{default:'#FFF'}},typography:{fontFamily:['DinProRegular','sans-serif'],fontSize:14,useNextVariants:true},type:'light',breakpoints:{values:{xs:0,sm:600,md:800,lg:1280,xl:1920}}});export default theme;
